title: Forbidden Desire
description: Aurora Black brings you book two in the Bring Me Pain series, a heart-wrenching and electrifying, romantic dark mafia thriller. There was never more of a time that I felt exhilaration from a single word, from a single glance. From behind the bars of my captivity, I was overwhelmed by his touch. And I wanted desperately to get away.Nik Kuztsov was my enemy, the man I should want to ruin. To destroy. But he was so much more than an adversary. He was the one who possessed something greater than my hate. He was starting to gain access to my heart.But he would prove to be my downfall when our common foe became unmasked, showing me how truly uncontrollable he could be. My devastation would unfurl as my world shattered at Nikâ€™s feet, and I began to realize that he might not be the one to help pick up the pieces he left in his wake.
author: Aurora  Black
